description: This bright and fresh prawn, avocado and pink grapefruit salad requires no cooking and is packed with citrus flavour.
name: Prawn, Avocado & Pink Grapefruit Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the grapefruit, removing the pith, with a sharp knife and squeeze the juice from the peel into a small bowl. Slice the grapefruit into thin rounds then slice each in half.
Whisk together the grapefruit juice, red chilli and olive oil and season to taste.
Slice the avocados in half, remove the stone, scoop the flesh out with a spoon and cut into half moons.
Add the watercress, avocado, prawns and grapefruit to a large bowl, pour over the dressing and mix well.
Divide the salad mix between 4 plates, sprinkle over chopped coriander and mint and serve.
